Bash("c:\\Users\\kevin\\Hobby Projects\\Rugby\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import os
path = r''c:\\Users\\kevin\\Hobby Projects\\Rugby\\data\\players.csv''
with open\(path, ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    rows = sum\(1 for _ in f\) - 1
remaining = 17724 - rows
rate = rows / \(55*60\)  # ~55 min since 09:47
print\(f''CSV rows: {rows:,} / 17,724 \({rows/17724*100:.1f}%\)''\)
print\(f''Rate: ~{rate:.1f}/sec \(~{rate*60:.0f}/min\)''\)
print\(f''Remaining: {remaining:,} | ETA: ~{remaining/rate/60:.0f}min \(~{remaining/rate/3600:.1f}h\)''\)
")

import os
